title: Apple Pay transit support widely  expanding in France starting in 2023
content:
After years of waiting, tourists and Île-de-France citizens will finally be able to use public transportation’s Navigo card with Apple Pay on their iPhones and Apple Watches starting 2023.

more…

The post Apple Pay transit support widely expanding in France starting in 2023 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After years of waiting, tourists and Île-de-France citizens will finally be able to use public transportation's Navigo card with Apple Pay on their iPhones and Apple Watches starting 2023.
